4. Ben Long

Ben Long
========

Long
----

Ben Long, Council Member, Place 6
---------------------------------

[Email Ben Long](mailto:blong@princetontx.us)

**Phon****e:**Â 972-736-2416

Ben Long has called Princeton home since 2020. Ben has been married over 20 years to his wife, Nicole, and they have 3 children together.

Ben has over 25 years of construction experience and currently works as a construction safety and health professional.

Some of his favorite hobbies involve his love for the outdoors, including camping with family, hiking, off-road bicycling, and gardening.

Benâ€™s mission will be to facilitate growth and ensure an enhanced quality of life for his community's neighbors, friends, and everyone.

Ben is dedicated to helping Princeton grow in the right direction!
